abstract: Fox dominated Tuesday night in the ratings as the final 12 singers competed on “American Idol,” attracting a television audience of 24.2 million viewers, according to Nielsen’s estimates. The performances easily led both the 8 and 9 p.m. hours with CBS’s reruns of “NCIS” (13.7 million) and “The Mentalist” (12.8 million) each finishing runner-up in their respective time slots.
lead_paragraph: Fox dominated Tuesday night in the ratings as the final 12 singers competed on “American Idol,” attracting a television audience of 24.2 million viewers, according to Nielsen’s estimates. The performances easily led both the 8 and 9 p.m. hours with CBS’s reruns of “NCIS” (13.7 million) and “The Mentalist” (12.8 million) each finishing runner-up in their respective time slots.

headline.main: Ratings: There’s ‘Idol’ and Then There’s Everything Else
